meanings.definition: A person who tends or raises cows.
meanings.sent1: The cowmen fed the cows in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The cowmen work hard to take care of the cows on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The cowmen told jokes to the cows while milking them.
meanings.sent4: The cowmen were the guardians of the peaceful bovine kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cowmen herding the cows under the golden sun stayed with me.

meanings.sent1: Many cowmen gathered at the cattle auction.
meanings.sent2: The cowmen rode their horses across the open fields.
meanings.sent3: The cowmen had a friendly competition to see who could lasso a cow the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The cowmen stood tall and proud, like ancient warriors of the prairie.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cowmen's laughter echoed through the valley.
